27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah said:"Whoever visits the sick, or visits his brother in Allah (faith), a caller calls out: 'May you have goodness and livelihood be good, and may you dwell in an adobe in Paradise

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي زِيَارَةِ الإِخْوَانِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Visiting Brothers
